Title: Authorizes the assessor to extend the filing deadline of a renewal application for an agricultural assessment when good cause is shown for the failure to file
Summary: Authorizes the assessor to extend the filing deadline of a renewal application for an agricultural assessment after the taxable status date when good cause is shown for the failure to file the application by such date.
LawCode: Amd ยง305, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to authorizing the assessor to extend the filing deadline of a renewal application for an agricultural assessment after the taxable status date when good cause is shown for the failure to file the application by such date
